channel.title: Error need help plz
channel.description: prphet-scape is not recognized as an internal or external command loading prophet-scape i dont no how to fix

item.title: Error need help plz
item.dc:creator: @deadly990 deadly990
item.description:
@deadly990 wrote:

@echo prphet-scape
that is trying to modify the echo command with prphet-scape when it should be just echoing profitscape delete the @ sign.

Read full topic

item.title: Error need help plz
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“darkboe pkz, post:1, topic:285791”]prphet-scape is not recognized as an internal or external command loading prophet-scape
i dont no how to fix[/quote]

deadly990:

i, and probably every1 else, do not have enough information to correctly diagnose the problem. please post screenshots and elaborate on what is going on.

I tend to see the problem right there… You must not know alot about a batch file because all this means is just right click it, click edit, and put "@echo " in front of that line, and make sure there is that space there otherwise u will get that error again.

@Deadly - i can also tell you the base on how this batch is set p (where the commands are)

@echo off
title prophet-scape
@echo prphet-scape
java -Xm500m -cp .; client
pause

BTW, that will also work (but i suggest just doing what i put up there already instead lol. Was just proving a point that form that little peice of info i can tell you what commands went where.

Read full topic
